alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Cumberland (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 10:16AM EDT until April 18 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... Cape Fear River At William O Huske Lock And Dam 3 affecting Cumberland and Bladen Counties. For the Cape Fear River...including William O Huske Lock And Dam 3, Elizabethtown, Lock And Dam 1...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cape Fear River At William O Huske Lock And Dam 3. * WHEN...From this evening to late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 42.0 feet, Water levels will top the navigational lock and equipment must be removed. Minor flooding will occur on land adjacent to the east bank of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 40.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 42.9 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday evening. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by this evening.
